SEARCH
Package it.unipv.ingsfw.JavaBeats.model.playable.audio

Class JBAudio

java.lang.Object
it.unipv.ingsfw.JavaBeats.model.playable.audio.JBAudio
All Implemented Interfaces:
IJBResearchable, IJBPlayable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Episode, Song
public abstract class JBAudio extends Object implements IJBPlayable
Abstract class representing a generic JavaBeats audio track. Contains attributes and methods common both to Song and Episode.
See Also:
  • IJBResearchable
  • Song
  • Episode
